thread.title: Oprah-supported pet hospice shut after mismanagement ruling
thread.title_full: Oprah-supported pet hospice shut after mismanagement ruling

title: Oprah-supported pet hospice shut after mismanagement ruling
text: > Entertainment Oprah-supported pet hospice shut after mismanagement ruling FILE - In this April 19, 2011 file photo, Susan Marino holds one of the dogs at her Angel's Gate animal hospice in Delhi, N.Y. The central New York pet hospice once supported by Oprah Winfrey and other celebrities has been shut down for financial mismanagement and ordered sold. New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman says Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, that 64-year-old Marino, owner of Angelâ€™s Gate in Delhi, had misused $3.1 million in charitable donations. (AP Photo/Mary Esch, File)
